translations: 殖民地化地，殖民地地（colonial 的副词形式）

sentences.sentence: Food compositions of birds in winter are complicated, and many species of birds feed colonially.
sentences.translation: 冬季鸟类食物组成多样，多种鸟类集群活动、觅食。

sentences.sentence: Instead, any cultural artifact produced by a member of a colonially oppressed out-group was deemed artistically and intellectually superior.
sentences.translation: 相反地，一些大量来自饱受殖民压迫的弱势集团所创造的文化被认为是具有较高艺术性和文化内涵的。
